Variable.desc: Array of desktop space IDs to rotate through (default: {1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7})
Variable.doc: Array of desktop space IDs to rotate through (default: {1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7}).
Variable.name: desktop_spaces

Variable.desc: Current index in the rotation sequence (1-based)
Variable.doc: Current index in the rotation sequence (1-based).
Variable.name: current_space_index

desc: Use Bing daily picture as your wallpaper, automatically. Updated to rotate wallpapers sequentially across 6 desktop spaces.
doc:
Use Bing daily picture as your wallpaper, automatically. Updated to rotate wallpapers sequentially across 6 desktop spaces.

Download: [https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/BingDaily.spoon.zip](https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/BingDaily.spoon.zip)

items.desc: Array of desktop space IDs to rotate through (default: {1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7})
items.doc: Array of desktop space IDs to rotate through (default: {1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7}).
items.name: desktop_spaces

items.desc: Current index in the rotation sequence (1-based)
items.doc: Current index in the rotation sequence (1-based).
items.name: current_space_index

Method.desc: Initialize the BingDaily spoon with space rotation functionality
Method.doc:
Initialize the BingDaily spoon with space rotation functionality

Parameters:
 * None
Method.name: init

Method.desc: Manually trigger wallpaper update for current space in rotation
Method.doc:
Manually trigger wallpaper update for current space in rotation

Parameters:
 * None
Method.name: updateCurrentSpace

Method.desc: Get current space information in the rotation
Method.doc:
Get current space information in the rotation

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A table containing: index, id, total_spaces, all_spaces
Method.name: getCurrentSpaceInfo
returns: * A table containing: index, id, total_spaces, all_spaces

Method.desc: Reset the space rotation index to a specific value
Method.doc:
Reset the space rotation index to a specific value

Parameters:
 * index - Optional number representing the space index to reset to (1-based), defaults to 1
Method.name: resetSpaceIndex
parameters: * index - Optional number representing the space index to reset to (1-based), defaults to 1
